column4: i just ran grub-install on /dev/sda and now can't boot windows
can someone help me boot windows?
edit /boot/grub/menu.lst   and you will see a section relating to windows, you need to make sure this is correct
grub partition numbers start at 0, not 1
you can live edit the grub line using e to edit the entry, once you know what works, boot to linux and change the file so the boot is correct
hmmm, you could reinstate the windows boot loader, then install grub again to make it pickup the boot
